Package seng202.team4.controller

Class RouteTabController

  • java.lang.Object
    • seng202.team4.controller.DataController
      • seng202.team4.controller.RouteTabController
  • public class RouteTabController
extends DataController
    Performs logic for the 'Routes' tab of the application; extends the DataController Class. Responsible for connecting the route data provided/added to the JavaFX interface, this includes initialising/updating the JavaFX TableView with data from the SQLite database table 'Routes' and also initialising/updating the additive filtering and searching of said data. Checkboxes in this table are used to add to a separate 'RoutesSelected' table and are used by both the Maps tab and the Emissions tab.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Holds the high level logic (set of instructions) for initialisation. Initialisation order: New Record Button, Sliders, Table Columns, Dataset Chooser ComboBox, Set Table

      • initialiseColumns

        private void initialiseColumns()
        Connect table columns to their respective Airport class attribute. Also makes the checkbox column for selecting specific rows.

      • initialiseSliders

        private void initialiseSliders()
        Connect sliders to their respective columns; sliders' maximum values are their corresponding column's max values.

      • makeCheckboxColumn

        private void makeCheckboxColumn()
        Makes the checkbox column for selecting specific rows of the Route table. Selected rows are then used by the Emissions tab, to calculated distance and carbon emissions, and the Map tab, to display chosen airports.

      • setTableData

        public void setTableData​(java.sql.ResultSet rs)
                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Sets the JavaFX Route table with rows from the 'Routes' table from the database.
        Specified by:
        setTableData in class DataController
        Parameters:
        rs - JDBC ResultSet obtained from querying the Database Route table and is used to set the rows of the JavaFX airport table by creating N Route objects from the query that results in N tuples.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the query fails, throws an exception

      • initialiseComboBoxes

        public void initialiseComboBoxes()
        Sorts and sets the FX observable lists to each respective combobox and uses ControlsFX to make these comboboxes searchable. filterdata() is also called here because filtering of the table is based on combobox selections and is required to be refreshed whenever a new dataset is chosen to be displayed.
        Specified by:
        initialiseComboBoxes in class DataController

      • filterData

        public void filterData()
        Filtering of table data is done here by initialising then iteratively adding each combobox/slider filter to a FilteredList object. Each filter requires addFilter(). Then the search bar filter is added through addSearchBar(). Finally the resulting SortedList is bound to the TableView dataTable and the result of the filtering is shown to the user.
        Specified by:
        filterData in class DataController

      • addFilter

        public javafx.collections.transformation.FilteredList<Route> addFilter​(javafx.collections.transformation.FilteredList<Route> filteredList,
                                                                       javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<java.lang.String> comboBox,
                                                                       java.lang.String filter)
        Adds a combobox filter, comboBox, to an input FilteredList, filteredList through adding a listener to comboBox (which works with combobox searching as well). The result is a new FilteredList which has the comboBox filter applied.
        Parameters:
        filteredList - the filtered list to add a filter to.
        comboBox - the searchable combobox filter that is added to the filteredList.
        filter - a String parameter used to specify which filter is being applied.
        Returns:
        the FilteredList with the new filter added.

      • addSearchBarFilter

        private javafx.collections.transformation.FilteredList<Route> addSearchBarFilter​(javafx.collections.transformation.FilteredList<Route> filteredList)
        Adds holistic search bar filter which searches the route's Airline Code, Source Airport Code, Destination Airport Code, and Plant Type Code.
        Parameters:
        filteredList - the last filter to be added to before the search bar.
        Returns:
        FilteredList with the search bar filter added.

      • setSliderMaxStops

        public void setSliderMaxStops()
        Gets maximum number of stops present in the 'Route' table of the database. Used to set the maximum value in the 'stops' slider filter.

        Override the parent's abstract class as to return the new record FXML file relating to the Route class.
        Specified by:
        getNewRecordFXML in class DataController
        Returns:
        String the path to the NEW_ROUTE_FXML file.
